title: Project
description: Metadata about the project for which tests are run.

name.description: The name of the project. Project name is detected from pyproject.toml file if the file exits.

version.description: The version of the project. Project version is detected using importlib.metadata if pyproject.toml file if the file exits.

repository_url.description: The URL of the project's repository.  Repositor URL is detected from pyproject.toml file if the file exits. The fields 'repository' and 'source' are looked for (case-insensitive) in respective order, and the first one found is used.
